name: Spike Pit
description: Watch your step, or you might poke your eye out

name: Bagpipe Music
description: And the room's big enough for the echo to go on and on and on...

name: Mimic Chest
description: Is this chest supposed to have teeth?

name: Giant Swinging Axes
description: You think they sharpen these often?

name: Sand-filled Room
description: No, you won't turn into Sandman

name: Lightning Runes
description: Someone should've been more careful when placing these!
